inclusion.criterion: Established diagnosis of COPD with FEV1 <60% predicted
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry revealed a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 60% of the predicted

inclusion.criterion: Patients of both genders will be included
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: IRB approved written informed consent will be obtained from each subject
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to beta agonists, theophylline, steroids, or roflumilast
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
